profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Paul E. Baran on December 31, 2007

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.abstract: Records from various task forces of the Environment Committee.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Membership lists, agendas, minutes, legislative material and reference material from a number of Environmental Committee task forces. These task forces relate to various environmental issues including acid rain, boating, campgrounds, the dairy industry, environmental crimes, environmental permitting, farm land protection, hunting safety, electric and magnetic fields, hazardous waste, land use, low level radioactive waste, newsprint recycling, open space, packaging, pesticides, recycling, seafood, solid waste, the spaying and neutering of pets, water resources. The material present for each task force varies.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: These records are stored at an off-site facility and therefore may not be available on a same-day basis.
